revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = SpectralLightningH3 | class = SpectralLightningH3 | game = Strife | convid = 82 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]]→[[Classes:SpectralLightningH1|SpectralLightningH1]]→SpectralLightningH3
The [[Classes:AlienSpectre2|Second Spectre]], [[Classes:EntityBoss|The Entity's]] and the [[Classes:EntitySecond|Sub Entity's]] version of [[Classes:Sigil2|Sigil 2]] shots, which have one seventh the base damage as the [[Classes:SpectralLightningH1|original]], probably for balance reasons. These projectiles are additionally emitted by [[Classes:SpectralLightningBigBall1|SpectralLightningBigBall1]] ([[Classes:Sigil5|Sigil 5]]) and [[Classes:SpectralLightningBigBall2|SpectralLightningBigBall2]] (the [[Classes:AlienSpectre5|Fifth Spectre]] and [[Classes:EntityBoss|The Entity's]] version) which fires them 3 at a time, one to its left, another ahead of it, and one to its right, at the same time. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SpectralLightningH3 : {{Class|SpectralLightningH1}} { {{Property|Damage}} 10 }
